title: Earth, fire and water
creator_credit: Fred Richardson, Peter Johnson and Film Australia
brief_description: Documentary examination of Australian natural disasters. People are interviewed about their experiences in floods, bushfires, cyclones etc. Emergency services personnel give advice about the best way to prevent and cope with disasters
creator_credit_for_label: Fred Richardson, Peter Johnson and Film Australia
